participant_1.background:
I used to drink chocolate milk shakes with my friends on hot summer days.
I like to cook Thai food and eat it too.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
i am fluent in spanish.
i have only one child.

participant_2.background:
As a tax collector, I would be unable to do my job if I were blind, as I would not be able to see the tax forms or the money being exchanged.
I spend my day taking my dog for walks, watching movies and reading books to keep me warm on cold winter days.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
My memories of my grandmother, who used to make the best mac and cheese in the world.
i despise sweet potatoes.

content.text: What do you like to do on your day off?
I like to take my dog for walks, watch movies, and read books to keep warm on cold winter days.
I like to do those things too! I also like to cook Thai food and eat it, and I enjoy spending time with my family.
I would love to learn how to cook Thai food! What's your favorite dish?
My favorite dish is pad thai! It's so delicious and flavorful.
That sounds delicious! I've never had it before, but I'm definitely going to have to try it.
You should! It's really easy to make, too.
Great! I'll have to look up a recipe.
You can also find some great recipes online.
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but I especially like romantic comedies and action movies.
I love romantic comedies too! They're so funny and heartwarming.
Me too! And action movies are always a good choice for a fun night in.
I agree! I love the adrenaline rush of an action movie.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
